summary: Provides a configurable convolutional decoder that transforms a spatial latent tensor into an image by cascading upsampling stages, applying residual blocks, group normalization, and optional attention mechanisms (including non‑local and flash attention) with support for ConvTranspose or interpolation upsampling.
business_intent: Reconstructs images from compressed latent representations in autoencoders or diffusion models, offering flexibility and efficiency for high‑quality image generation.
